desc: Fallcreek Lures handcrafts the Roman Craw, a hard-body lure resembling a live crawfish with grooves in abdomen, jointed body, internal rattle, premium fiber weed guard, tournament grade stout hook and its unique soft bait retaining device allowing the anger to choose the soft plastic pinchers (pinchers not included).

layout.text: The Roman Craw is a unique life-like, hard-bodied crawfish lure with a soft plastic retaining device to allow you to affix the soft plastic pinchers you choose.
